Name: Zelda Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Bison grass vodka combines brilliantly with mint and almond.
History: Created in May 2002 by Phillip Jeffrey at the GE Club, London, England. He made it for a friend called Zelda - the name really wouldn't have worked if she'd been called Tracy.
